nodes.text: Gold Four was the call sign of the fourth member of Gold Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Gold Four.
The callsign was used by Rebel Alliance Lieutenant Lepira when he flew during the Battle of Yavin. Lepira was killed in the assault against the first Death Star.
Four years later, another pilot designated Gold Four fought against Nagai forces in the Second Battle of Endor.
During a simulation exercise to qualify for Wedge Antilles's new squadron, Tyria Sarkin used the callsign of Gold Four.
